title: Could we make Karthus Q Smartcast like Cassiopeia's Q?
body:
Cass in her update received a range indicator for her q, and i was wondering if Riot could do the same for Karthus?
{{champion:30}} {{item:3070}}

replies.body: Idk, considering the how spammable Karth Q is compared to cass Q

> [{quoted}](name=Nice Shade,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=P0GfEXsr,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-09-09T17:39:33.027+0000)
>
> Idk, considering the how spammable Karth Q is compared to cass Q

i mean her E does as much damage and its point and click and has low cd as well.

i dont see why would i care about giving people such probably rather trivial information that they should have access to

Yea but her E is weak unless you hit Q/W for the poison

While karth's Q just does alot of damage and even more if you hit with the center of it.
not center just when it hits a single target then it crits
I mean you could just turn on smartest in your gameplay options.........
even with it you cant see that range on his Q KArthus will cast it if it is in range and will walk to range if it isnt same if you trun off  smartcast
What do you mean range indicator? Are you saying you can't turn that on for him?
His Q ability is naturally just a smart cast ability I don't think you can set it to show the range while holding key and then release to cast like you can with Cassiopia.
